Using old skate boards is interesting, but you can make an electric guitar body out of any old wood, even shipping crates & pallets. All it has to be is a solid hardwood of some kind that you route into shape. I suppose you would get a similar effect to this if you stacked and glued up a bunch of floor laminate.
Nice job, it looks great.
